isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-8609 SERIES - INSTALL - AUXILIARY SECTION

note.para: Make sure the synchronizer is in neutral and that auxiliary front counter- shaft bearings are installed in the front case.

step1.para: Position gasket on the auxiliary housing. Attach a chain hoist to the auxiliary. Move the assembly evenly into the rear of the front case, piloting it on the dowel pins. As the assembly is moved forward, the countershaft drive gears will mesh with the auxiliary drive gear ( Figure 225).

figure.caption: Figure 225. Move Assembly Evenly into Rear of Front Case

note.para: Engage the front section in gear and rotate the input shaft to help mesh the auxiliary drive gear and countershaft drive gears (inset).

step1.para: Install fifteen bolts in the auxiliary housing flange. Tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 •m) ( Figure 226). Make sure the bolts are in their proper position.

figure.caption: Figure 226. Install Bolts in Auxiliary Housing Flange
